active.name: Sandswipe
active.effects: {{tip|Dash}} to 150 units beyond the {{tt|target enemy champion's location|At the end of the cast time.}}, and upon completing the dash, deal {{as|12% {{as|(+ 5% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} to the target. You then deal 20% increased damage to the target for the next 3 seconds.

You then deal 20% increased damage to the target for the next 3 seconds.
